Albania: Ottoman forces crushed Albanian resistance fighters at Prizren. The leaders of the League of Prizren and their families were arrested and deported.
Barbados: The Executive Council is created separate of the Upper House by an Act of local Parliament.
Chile: Chilean troops occupy Lima, the capital of Perú. Boundary treaty of 1881 between Chile and Argentina.
Poland: Great Synagogue was constructed in Łódź.
Russia:
Constitution proposed, Alexander II agrees to it but doesn't get a chance to sign it
Alexander II was assassinated by Ignacy Hryniewiecki of the People's Will. His son, Alexander III, becomes tsar.
Persia officially recognized Russia's annexation of Khwarazm in the Treaty of Akhal.
Sudan: Mahdist War: A war began against the United Kingdom and Egypt
